explanations.unsupervised learning: The paper highlights the efficacy of a class of unsupervised machine learning methods, specifically using an autoencoder trained on normal data.

explanations.deep learning: The paper employs a deep neural network autoencoder, which is a deep learning technique.
explanations.autoencoder: The paper specifically uses an autoencoder (AE) to detect anomalous payment flows by producing reconstruction errors.
